column4: hello , everyone, could you tell me how can i  rotate my term screen ( ctrl+alt+1)   90 degree
hello , everyone, could you tell me how can i  rotate my term screen ( ctrl+alt+1)   90 degree
you refering to the console display? or the X sessions display?
the consoles an use the framebuffer, so it might be doable with the various fbset or other fb settings..
